TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputHidden extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HtmlInputHidden Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler
type HtmlInputHidden = class inherit HtmlInputControl interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您可以使用控制項將會對使用者隱藏的內的資訊內嵌`
`項目。You can use the control to embed information that is hidden from the user within a `` element. 網頁回傳至伺服器時，會傳送這項資訊。This information is sent when the Web page is posted back to the server. 控制項提供事件所引發的時機屬性變更發佈至伺服器之間的值。The control provides a event that is raised when the property changes values between posts to the server. 這可讓您建立事件處理常式，每次引發事件時執行一組自訂的指示。This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 控制項不提供內建的方式，回傳至伺服器。The control does not provide a built-in way to post back to the server. 您必須提供支援張貼至伺服器，例如網頁上的另一個控制項控制項，將控制項的值傳送至伺服器。You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting to the server, such as an control, to send the value of the control back to the server. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 網頁架構會使用此 HTML 功能會自動載入和保存的頁面上的伺服器控制項檢視狀態。The ASP.NET page framework uses this HTML feature to automatically load and persist the view state of server controls on a page. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制儲存在網頁上發佈至伺服器之間的資訊。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control to store information on the Web page between posts to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputHidden Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputHidden Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputHidden Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputHidden Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Hidden"的常值字串。The "hidden" literal string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的新執行個體控制，並將它放在網頁上。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the control and place it on the Web page. summary.span: 處理 控制項的回傳資料。

span.span: Processes the postback data for the control.

span.span: if the control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會檢查是否的回傳值控制不同於先前的值，和如果是的話，會傳回`true`。The method checks to see whether the postback value of the control is different from the previous value, and if so, returns `true`. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫之前轉譯控制項。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，使其適用於 HTML 編碼輸入的值，以自訂伺服器控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it applies HTML encoding to the input value in a custom server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputhidden_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputhidden_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputhidden_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputhidden_onprerender.vb#2)]

span.span: A that contains event data.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 這個方法允許您直接處理事件。

span.span: This method allows you to handle the event directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時在伺服器上變更屬性。The event is raised when the property is changed on the server. > [!NOTE] > 控制項必須具有啟用檢視狀態事件才能正確運作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 呼叫 方法以通知 控制項，表示控制項的狀態已變更。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers to extend the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 發生於 屬性在伺服器上變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the property is changed on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時發佈至伺服器期間變更屬性。The event is raised when the property is changed between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 控制項必須具有啟用檢視狀態事件才能正確運作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
